message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a unique opportunity to own something truly special. I'm willing to sell it to you for $9500. What do you think?
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the uniqueness of the product. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $8500.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. After careful consideration, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm counteroffering at $9000. What do you think?
